    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      Starts a new TimerTask to update the time information in this model every second.

    • pauseTimer

      public void pauseTimer()
      Cancels (Stops) the TimerTask (if it is running) so time information is no longer updated.

    • stopTimer

      public void stopTimer()
      Stops the timer if it is running or paused.

    • stopAndResetTimer

      public void stopAndResetTimer()
      Resets time information to default values (0) and notifies the models observers.

    • updateTimer

      public void updateTimer()
      Adds one second every time this method is being called. Increases minutes and hours if nessecary.
      Notifes the models observers.

    • timerToString

      public String timerToString(boolean showSeconds)
      Creates a String from the stored time information in format HH:mm or HH:mm:ss depending on the given boolean argument.
      Parameters:
      showSeconds - Set true if seconds should be returned in String.
      Returns:
      String in format HH:mm or HH:mm:ss

    • retrieveProjects

      public void retrieveProjects()
      This method retrieves all projects the current user is assigned to from the database and adds them to an ArrayList for using them in a ComboBox (Dropdown).

    • retrieveServices

      public void retrieveServices()
      This method retrieves all services and adds them to an ArrayList for using them in a ComboBox (Dropdown).
